member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard
member.summary: An SDCard module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.Mount
member.returns: Whether or not the card was successfully mounted.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.Unmount
member.returns: Whether or not the card was successfully unmounted.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.Mounted
member.summary: Raised when the file system of the SD card is mounted.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.Unmounted
member.summary: Raised when the file system of the SD card is unmounted.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.IsCardInserted
member.summary: Whether or not an SD card is inserted.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.IsCardMounted
member.summary: Whether or not the SD card is mounted.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.StorageDevice
member.summary: The StorageDevice for the currently mounted SD card.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.MountedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used for the Mounted event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A storage device that can be used to access the SD card.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.SDCard.UnmountedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used for the Unmounted event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
